sections.title: Movement
sections.text: Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the falling piece left and right.

sections.title: Soft Drop
sections.text: Press the Down Arrow or S key to make the piece fall faster while you control it.

sections.title: Hard Drop
sections.text: Press Space to instantly drop the piece to the lowest possible position.

sections.title: Rotation
sections.text: Press the Up Arrow or W key to rotate the piece clockwise.

sections.title: Hold
sections.text: Press Shift or Ctrl to store the current piece and swap it with the held one.

sections.title: Clearing Lines
sections.text: Fill an entire horizontal line with blocks to clear it and earn points.

sections.title: Speed and Levels
sections.text: As you clear more lines, the level increases and pieces fall faster.

sections.title: Game Over
sections.text: The game ends when new pieces can no longer enter the playfield. You can then return to the main menu.

sections.title: Plan Ahead
sections.text: Watch the next piece preview and plan your moves in advance.

sections.title: Use Hold Wisely
sections.text: Holding a piece can save you in difficult situations, but you can only use it once per drop.

sections.title: Stay Calm
sections.text: As the speed increases, staying calm and focused is the key to success.
